metadata.Title: CVE-2020-26519 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Artifex MuPDF before 1.18.0 has a heap based buffer over-write when parsing JBIG2 files allowing attackers to cause a denial of service.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-26519` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

mupdf - 1.17.0+ds1-1.1
mupdf-tools - 1.17.0+ds1-1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mupdf package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.17.0+ds1-1.1').
